name: Varian
title: High King of the Alliance
description: Multiclass Heroes defined by their talents rather than role.

role.name: Multiclass
role.description: Multiclass Heroes defined by their talents rather than role.

abilities.name: Lion's Fang
abilities.description: Create a shockwave that travels in a straight line, dealing 150 damage and slowing enemies by 35% for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Parry
abilities.description: Parry all incoming Basic Attacks for 1.25 seconds, reducing their damage by 100%. Stores up to 2 charges.

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.description: Charge to the target enemy, dealing 50 damage and slowing them by 75% for 1 second.

heroics.name: Taunt
heroics.description: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds. Passive: Maximum Health increased by 30%. Passive: Gain 15 Armor.

heroics.name: Colossus Smash
heroics.description: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 damage and lowering their Armor by 25 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 25% increased damage. Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health reduced by 10%.

heroics.name: Twin Blades of Fury
heroics.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds. Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.

original.name: Varian
original.title: High King of the Alliance
original.description: Few would have expected that the gladiator known only as Lo'Gosh was in truth the missing ruler of Stormwind, Varian Wrynn. Now the High King of the Alliance, his every action shapes the destiny of Azeroth itself.
original.shortDescription: A Multi-Class Hero that can Tank for his team or become a high damage Assassin.

baseHeroInfo.name: Varian
baseHeroInfo.title: High King of the Alliance
baseHeroInfo.description: Few would have expected that the gladiator known only as Lo'Gosh was in truth the missing ruler of Stormwind, Varian Wrynn. Now the High King of the Alliance, his every action shapes the destiny of Azeroth itself.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Multi-Class Hero that can Tank for his team or become a high damage Assassin.

role.name: Multiclass
role.description: Multiclass Heroes defined by their talents rather than role.

trait.name: Heroic Strike
trait.description: Every 18 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack deals 140 bonus Spell damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

abilities.description: Create a shockwave that travels in a straight line, dealing 150 damage and slowing enemies by 35% for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.description: Parry all incoming Basic Attacks for 1.25 seconds, reducing their damage by 100%. Stores up to 2 charges.

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.description: Charge to the target enemy, dealing 50 damage and slowing them by 75% for 1 second.

heroicAbilities.description: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 damage and lowering their Armor by 25 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 25% increased damage. Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health reduced by 10%.

heroicAbilities.name: Twin Blades of Fury
heroicAbilities.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds. Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.

multiclassRoles.name: Assassin
multiclassRoles.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

roleSecondary.name: Assassin
roleSecondary.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

trait.description: Every 18 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack deals 140 bonus Spell damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Lion's Fang
abilities.description: Create a shockwave that travels in a straight line, dealing 150 damage and slowing enemies by 35% for 1.5 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Twin Blades of Fury
heroicAbilities.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds. Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.

skins.name: High King of the Alliance
skins.description: Few would have expected that the gladiator known only as Lo'Gosh was in truth the missing ruler of Stormwind, Varian Wrynn. Now the High King of the Alliance, his every action shapes the destiny of Azeroth itself.

skins.name: Lionheart Varian
skins.description: The Lion has long been associated with the nation of Stormwind and the House of Wrynn. It is a symbol of courage, dignity and ferocity; truly befitting for the High King.

skins.name: Lo'Gosh Varian
skins.description: After awakening on the shores of Durotar, the gladiator known as Lo'Gosh became a star of the Crimson Ring Arena. Rumor has it that he fights with the fury of the Ghost Wolf himself.

auxiliaryHeroInfo.name: Varian
auxiliaryHeroInfo.title: High King of the Alliance
auxiliaryHeroInfo.description: Few would have expected that the gladiator known only as Lo'Gosh was in truth the missing ruler of Stormwind, Varian Wrynn. Now the High King of the Alliance, his every action shapes the destiny of Azeroth itself.
auxiliaryHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Multi-Class Hero that can Tank for his team or become a high damage Assassin.
